pr_title: don't invoke pattern rules with hints inapplicable to a sentence

timeline.message:
don't invoke pattern rules with hints inapplicable to a sentence

extract RuleSet out of XmlRuleDisambiguator, support lemma hints there, use it in JLanguageTool.check as well

timeline.bodyText: Could you maybe add a unit test for this class? I think it's a good approach to have a test for any new class.
timeline.author: danielnaber
